buildPhases.description: Monitors Google Drive folder for new image files and filters them by supported image formats. Acts as the workflow trigger to start processing when new images are detected.
Evaluates whether detected files are new images that need processing. Filters out files that don't meet the criteria for further processing.
Downloads the actual image file from Google Drive to make it available for AI analysis and processing. Retrieves the binary image data for subsequent operations.

Uses AI vision to analyze image content and detect objects, colors, mood, and visual elements. Generates SEO-optimized descriptions, titles, and social media captions based on the analysis. Creates multiple image sizes for different platforms.
Uploads processed images to AWS S3 for permanent storage and public access. Prepares structured metadata for database insertion including file paths, AI tags, and descriptions.
Updates PostgreSQL database with comprehensive image metadata and posts content to social media platforms. Tracks posting status and completion across all integrated services.

Monitors Google Drive folder for new image files and filters them by supported image formats. Acts as the workflow trigger to start processing when new images are detected.

Downloads the actual image file from Google Drive to make it available for AI analysis and processing. Retrieves the binary image data for subsequent operations.

Uses AI vision to analyze image content and detect objects, colors, mood, and visual elements. Generates SEO-optimized descriptions, titles, and social media captions based on the analysis. Creates multiple image sizes for different platforms.

##  Decision
Evaluates whether detected files are new images that need processing. Filters out files that don't meet the criteria for further processing.

##  Outputs
Uploads processed images to AWS S3 for permanent storage and public access. Prepares structured metadata for database insertion including file paths, AI tags, and descriptions.

Updates PostgreSQL database with comprehensive image metadata and posts content to social media platforms. Tracks posting status and completion across all integrated services.

##  Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

##  Triggers
Monitors Google Drive folder for new image files and filters them by supported image formats. Acts as the workflow trigger to start processing when new images are detected.

##  Inputs
Downloads the actual image file from Google Drive to make it available for AI analysis and processing. Retrieves the binary image data for subsequent operations.

##  Transform
Uses AI vision to analyze image content and detect objects, colors, mood, and visual elements. Generates SEO-optimized descriptions, titles, and social media captions based on the analysis. Creates multiple image sizes for different platforms.

##  Decision
Evaluates whether detected files are new images that need processing. Filters out files that don't meet the criteria for further processing.

##  Outputs
Uploads processed images to AWS S3 for permanent storage and public access. Prepares structured metadata for database insertion including file paths, AI tags, and descriptions.

Updates PostgreSQL database with comprehensive image metadata and posts content to social media platforms. Tracks posting status and completion across all integrated services.
